revision.text:
{{Infobox quest |name = The Four Devas |image = XC3 Challenge Battle Mode.png |description = "Apex of pinnacle of strongest foes in all of Aionios... Is ultimate challenge! Archsage shaking out of control...!" |giver = [[Nopon Archsage]] |location = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |prereqs = Main Story completed |difficultyCB3 = 5 |rewards = 1800-2500 [[Noponstone]]s (Easy)
3600-5000 [[Noponstone]]s (Normal)
5400-7500 [[Noponstone]]s (Hard) }} '''The Four Devas''' is a Time Attack [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] in {{XC3}}. It can be received from [[Nopon Archsage]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]], available as downloadable content from the second part of the Expansion Pass. Clearing this challenge with at least an A rank for the first time will reward the player with an [[Accomplished Ring]]. == Challenge Rules == {| class="xc1" |Waves||4 |- |Level Restriction||Lv 99 |- |Other Rules||In this challenge, new waves will begin over time or when one enemy remains. |} == Enemies == {| class="xc1" !Wave !Enemy !Level |- | 1 || [[Kilocorn Grandeps]] || 150 |- | 2 || [[Perilwing Ryuho]] || 160 |- | 3 || [[Dreadwyrm Nizoont]] || 170 |- | 4 || [[Seraphic Ceratinia]] || 200 |} == Trivia == *"The Four Devas" is a common alternate translation of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_Heavenly_Kings Four Heavenly Kings] of Buddhist religion. [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battles]]

{{Infobox quest |name = The Kind Right Hand |image = The Kind Right Hand.jpg |description = "After climbing up a cliff that continues on to the Great Sword, the party fends off a Levnis-backed force." |giver = |location = [[Ribbi Flats]] ([[Precipice of Judgment]]) |time = Story |prereqs = |reclevel = Lv. 20 |rewards = 400 [[Colony 30]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
1160 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
1410 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Valdi]] as a [[Hero]]
Wall Climbing as a [[Traversal Skill]] }} '''The Kind Right Hand''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Valdi]]. This quest is required to progress the story. == Objectives == # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Strange Keves Soldier]] #* [[Velites]] #* [[Equites]] # ''Collect the specified thing(s).'' #* [[Levnis Endoskeleton]] (1) #* [[Levnis Self-Charger]] (1) #* [[Levnis Auxiliary CPU]] (1) # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Elsie's Spout]] # ''Follow the specified character(s).'' #* Valdi's [[Mechafriend|Mini-Levnis]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Incomplete Siege-Lev]] == Results == ''"With the [[Colony 30]] [[Flame Clock]] destroyed, Valdi fight to protect everyone began in earnest. He also vowed to help you, his new friends."'' {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:Valdi]] [[Category:Fornis Region Quests]]

{{Infobox quest |name = The Two Saviors |image = XC3 Challenge Battle Mode.png |description = "Here is ace from sleeve of Archsage: battle against two heroes of legend! Careful when to attack and defend!" |giver = [[Nopon Archsage]] |location = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |prereqs = Main game and {{XC3FR|sublink}} completed |difficultyCB3 = 4 |rewards = 1050-1500 [[Noponstone]]s (Easy)
[[Noponstone]]s (Normal)
[[Noponstone]]s (Hard) }} '''The Two Saviors''' is a Time Attack [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] in {{XC3}}. It can be accepted from the [[Nopon Archsage]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]], available as downloadable content from the second part of the Expansion Pass. Clearing this challenge with at least an A rank for the first time will reward the player with an [[Accomplished Earring]], while the first time completing it with any rank will unlock [[Shulk]] and [[Rex]] as [[Hero]]es in the main game. During this challenge, "[[Battle!!]]" from {{XC2}} plays. == Challenge Rules == {| class="xc1" |Waves||1 |- |Level Restriction||Lv 70 |- |Other Rules||In this challenge, you will not be able to use Chain Attacks. |} == Enemies == {| class="xc1" ! Wave ! Enemy ! Level |- | rowspan="2" | 1 || [[Shulk#Challenge Battle|Godcleaver Shulk]] || 80 |- | [[Rex#Challenge Battle|Stoutheart Rex]] || 80 |} [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battles]]

{{Infobox quest |name = The Wrath of Ashera |image =The Wrath of Ashera.jpg |description = "The commander of Colony 11, Ashera, invites the party to join her on her personal battlefield. They're not very excited about what's to come..." |giver = [[Ashera]] |location = [[Syra Hovering Reefs]] |time = |prereqs = |reclevel = Lv. 36 |rewards = 400 [[Colony 11]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
2320 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
2480 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Ashera]] as a [[Hero]] }} '''The Wrath of Ashera''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Ashera]]. == Objectives == # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* 7th [[Levnis]] Troop (7) #** [[Velites]] (3) #** [[Keves Sniper]] (2) #** [[Keves Trooper]] (2) # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Ashera]] at [[First Ixia Bridge]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Team Zoren (10) #** [[Zoren#Battle|Spearhead Zoren]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Team Easel (10) #** [[Easel#Battle|Fellplume Easel]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Team Clad (10) #** [[Clad#Battle|Tenacious Clad]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony 11]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* R's Executioners (7) #** [[R#Battle|Moebius R]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* Ashera at Colony 11 == Results == ''"The party puts an end to the fight with Colony 11, but having learned the reason why Ashera fights as she does, Eunie anticipates further trouble ahead..."'' {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:Ashera]] [[Category:Keves Castle Region Quests]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Thermo Headgear |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Increases Critical Rate by 15 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Thermo Headgear |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Increases Critical Rate by 16 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Thermo Headgear |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Increases Critical Rate by 17 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Thermo Headgears''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]
